title: Winter Clothing Drive
description: Distributed warm clothes to over 500 individuals in underserved areas during peak winter.

title: Blood Donation Camp
description: Organized a blood donation drive in collaboration with local hospitals, collecting 200+ units.

title: Flood Relief Operation
description: Provided emergency supplies and medical aid to flood-affected regions.

title: Eye Checkup Camp
description: Free vision screening and spectacles distribution for underprivileged communities.
